name: jujutsu
title: Jujutsu
description: Manage Jujutsu repositories and version control
author: knoopx

commands.name: main
commands.title: JJ Main Operations
commands.subtitle: Main JJ operations interface
commands.description: Access all Jujutsu operations through a unified interface using navigation

commands.name: status
commands.title: JJ Status
commands.subtitle: Show working copy status
commands.description: Display the current status of the Jujutsu working copy

commands.name: log
commands.title: JJ Log
commands.subtitle: Show change history
commands.description: Display the log of changes in the repository

commands.name: new-change
commands.title: JJ New Change
commands.subtitle: Create a new change
commands.description: Create a new change on top of the current one

commands.name: describe
commands.title: JJ Describe
commands.subtitle: Edit change description
commands.description: Edit the description of the current change

commands.name: diff
commands.title: JJ Diff
commands.subtitle: Show changes
commands.description: Show the diff of the working copy

commands.name: bookmarks
commands.title: JJ Bookmarks
commands.subtitle: Manage bookmarks
commands.description: List and manage Jujutsu bookmarks for a repository

commands.name: squash
commands.title: JJ Squash
commands.subtitle: Squash changes
commands.description: Move changes from current change into parent or interactively select changes to squash

commands.name: split
commands.title: JJ Split
commands.subtitle: Split change
commands.description: Split the current change into multiple changes

commands.name: abandon
commands.title: JJ Abandon
commands.subtitle: Abandon change
commands.description: Abandon the current change and create a new empty one in place

commands.name: resolve
commands.title: JJ Resolve
commands.subtitle: Resolve merge conflicts
commands.description: Resolve merge conflicts in the working copy

commands.name: edit
commands.title: JJ Edit
commands.subtitle: Time travel to different changes
commands.description: Edit/navigate to different changes in history

commands.name: workflow
commands.title: JJ Workflow
commands.subtitle: Execute operation workflows
commands.description: Run predefined workflows for common JJ operations like sync, pull, or push

commands.name: revset
commands.title: JJ Revset
commands.subtitle: Query changes with revset
commands.description: Query changes using Jujutsu revset expressions
